'''Cora Bolger, née Goodbody''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Cora married [[Rudolph Bolger]]. They had one son, [[Fastolph Bolger|Fastolph]], born {{SR|1210}}.<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name ''Cora'' was meaningless in contemporary [[Hobbitish]] [[Westron]]. It represented an original name ''Coro'' or ''Core''.<ref>{{App|Translation}}</ref>
